author: William Wan, Philip Bump
title: What U.S. leaders say affects whether Americans stay at home, CDC data suggests - The Washington Post
description: What U.S. leaders say affects whether Americans stay at home, CDC data suggests The Washington Post CDC report says people in four key cities are listening to stay at home orders CNN View Full Coverage on Google News
content: The CDC used cellphone data from four cities New York, San Francisco, Seattle and New Orleans and correlated it with when governors, mayors and President Trump announced states of emergency, limits on mass gatherings, school closures and White House recommend… [+4180 chars]
